metadata.name: Gangster Hamsters
metadata.description: "Made it Ma! ... Top of the Wheel!" (Floyd - Gangster Hamster.) Take a little trip through the underworld of mini-mobsters... From seedy joints to the Ferret Bureau of Investigation, by way of downtown squeakeasies. And discover what happens when hamsters go bad. Crime.  Love. Violence. Peanuts. Just some of the themes that spin around in this book.
